code:
-spec min_size_subarray(Nums :: [integer()], Target :: integer()) -> integer().
min_size_subarray(Nums, Target) ->
    PrefixSum = lists:foldl(fun(X, [H|T]) -> [X+H|T] end, [0], Nums),
    MinLength = lists:foldl(fun(X, Acc) -> min(Acc, find_min_length(PrefixSum, X, Target, length(Nums))) end, infinity, PrefixSum),
    if MinLength == infinity -> -1; true -> MinLength end.

find_min_length(PrefixSum, CurrentSum, Target, Length) ->
    case lists:dropwhile(fun(X) -> X < CurrentSum - Target end, PrefixSum) of
        [H|_] when CurrentSum - H >= Target -> Length - length(PrefixSum) + 1;
        _ -> infinity
    end.
